inclusion.criterion: essential tremor with a history or ethanol responsiveness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: off medications used to treat essential tremor for at least 2 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: withhold ethanol and caffeine from 24 hours prior to starting the study until study termination (10 days)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: abnormalities on neurologic exam other than tremor
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: renal failure, hepatic failure and chronic lung disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: other chronic medications that cannot be temporarily discontinued for the length of the study (10 days)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: moral or religious reasons do not wish to take a potentially intoxicating drug
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: abnormalities on their baseline screening laboratory tests
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: people of Asian decent who may differ pharmocogenetically with respect to alcohol and aldehyde dehydrogenase and may have increased sensitivity to alcohols and their metabolites
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of tremors since a year ago, which is likely essential tremor. He must be off medications used to treat essential tremor for at least 2 weeks and withhold ethanol and caffeine from 24 hours prior to starting the study until study termination (10 days).
